response.overview: After overhearing a shocking secret, precocious orphan Lyra Belacqua trades her carefree existence roaming the halls of Jordan College for an otherworldly adventure in the far North, unaware that it's part of her destiny.
response.tagline: There are worlds beyond our own. The compass will show the way.
response.title: The Golden Compass

titles.title: ライラの冒険 黄金の羅針盤
À la croisée des mondes - La Boussole d'or
ライラのぼうけん おうごんのらしんば

results.name: "I Have a Contract with the Girl"
